name: Brutal Aliens Lava
description:
Team Name: ChackPunks What platform is your game built for? Windows You need to get to the top of the tower by avoiding lava and killing opponents. You get energy from opponents to move up.

Gameplay Instructions
WASD to move
Space (2x) to DoubleJump
Shift to Dash

Non-original content: https://fonts-online.ru/fonts/banana-brick https://www.weloveindies.com/en/music-for-games https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/alien-bc4db76ad4b54451b07d035cdaeed7de This build has one bug, but the game is passable, sorry, there is a working build
